title: Anyone need an editor for an upcoming leauge channel?
body:
Hello Leauge Community :)
My name is Yordle Snap Trap on the OCE server and I'm looking for a twitch streamer / leauge player who wants to transfer content onto youtube.
This will just consist of me editing your clips and uploading them to a youtube channel under your name (I'm sure you know how it works).
 I am able to put out 2-3 videos per week.
I'm relatively new to editing so I'm looking for some experience :)
You need to either have a reasonable twitch following 10+ viewers or send me the content!
If you are interested please comment down below and we can talk more in-depth about it.

replies.body: Hi Yordle, I added you in game
